doc.title: Hircine Airlines
doc.plot: Hircine Airlines is a story about the greed of a corporate aristocracy, and the delusion and chilling isolation it ultimately brings to its most elite. Except that it's told with dancing birds. And lots of planes fly around and stuff. There's poetry. There's tuneful whistling. There's dancing planets and there's drunken online dating. The film takes the form of three consecutive commercial spots for Hircine Airlines, a luxury travel entity which promises seats to only the most elite of our society.
